Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Team Rosters:

·         A team will consist of seven (minimum) and fourteen (maximum) players with at least three males and three females.

·         Teams will consist of up to ten players on the field at one time with no more than five male players.

 

Lineup Cards:

·         The batting order, including all substitutes, must be filled in on the lineup card

·         The lineup card must be given to the Games Manager/Scorekeeper and opposing captain before the game can begin.

·         Players will bat in the order written on the lineup card.

 

Substitutions:

·         All substitutions must take place at the top of the inning. Therefore, visiting team players who bat in the top half of the inning

must also field in the bottom half of that inning and home team players who field in the top half of the inning must also bat in the

bottom half of that inning.

·         All substitutions must be approved and recorded on the lineup card by the Games Manager/Scorekeeper BEFORE the change takes

place.

·         The opposing team must also be notified of the change.
